What is Ping Practice?

What is Ping Practice?

Last edited: January 25, 2025

A camera roll for your thoughts —

Ping Practice is a not-for-profit journaling app and method

Meant to help you carry a conversation with yourself across time...

Ping Practice is an evolving journaling methodology and app. Its basis are pings.1 The idea is to be in better conversation with your present, past, and future selves — ideally enabling you to be your best self in the here & now.

We often use the metaphor “camera roll for your thoughts” which seems to resonate with many people.

Similar to swiping through photos on your phone, you should also be able to do something similar for your thoughts — or pings — as we like to call them...

A camera roll for your thoughts —

While we are developing Ping Practice, we encourage all people who ping to develop their own—no two ping practices will look or feel exactly the same.
